content.question: Which of the following does the author most directly use as evidence for the persistence of the religious reformers?

choices.label: Their silence in the face of Church counterattacks
The support of political rulers trying to advance their own agendas
Their use of the printing press to denounce their accusers
The dissent of ordinary, moderately prosperous householders

content.answer: Their use of the printing press to denounce their accusers

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
